title: EKF Localizer Configuration for Twist Measurement

twist_gate_dist_xy.description: Limit of distance [m/s] used for outliers detection about xy. (Note: twist consider only vx as linear velocity so it is a simple absolute difference in vx)

twist_gate_dist_yaw.description: Limit of distance [rad/s] used for outliers detection about yaw. (Note: it is a simple absolute difference in yaw)
